name: Perfectly Generic
description:
Perfectly Generic is a very simple concept game, with a very small window and small feature set.

I hope to improve the game if the community enjoys this little demo, with features multiplayer, LUA scripting, paint, and more

Controls

Movement: WASD

Place block: Q

Place ghost: X

Destroy objects: E

Change colour: Z

Save: C

Load: V

Gravity toggle: G

Reset position: F

Debug mode: H

Export as PNG: R

Place switch: B

Place door: N

Place wires: Y

Show/hide wires: U

Activate switches/doors: J (Cannot be inside the switch/door when used)
